Usage: <cmd> sitename [value]
Display or change the nologinmsg value. IT'LL ONLY WORK ON GLFTPD SITES!
Value can be 0 or 1. Leave it blank to display current value.
Using this could speedup login, it add '-' at first char to password to bypass welcome message.
Example: <cmd> HQ1 1 [HQ1 is GLFTPD SITE]

You can use the special sitename * to list all nologinmsg values.
